title: White House staff in turmoil after another messy exit
text:
White House staff in turmoil after another messy exit 2:15pm EST - 02:12 
A White House staffer resigning over allegations that he abused two of his ex-wives is simply the latest in a series of headline-making departures from the White House. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A White House staffer resigning over allegations that he abused two of his ex-wives is simply the latest in a series of headline-making departures from the White House. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2slbFkB
